text: Bad ni xallxhˌ di thrng phxnphan kæ phwk cea læw læa thrng ru wa thæcring nı hmu phwk cea nan mi khwam xxnxæ dangnan hak nı hmu phwk cea mi rxy khn thi xdthn k ca chna sxng rxy khn læa hak nı hmu phwk cea mi sxng phan khn k ca chna sxng phan khn dwy xnumati khx ngxallxhˌ læa xallxhˌ nan thrng xyu rwm kab phu xdthn thanghlay
